entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.5°C

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
